title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // TRAILER: Fallout
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Guys I think this season is going to be the most legendary yet ! They are bringing back two of the most OG legendary seasons... into one I mean omg !
This 100% has to do with Evan Peters’ character being a hairdresser.. an indirect link? Maybeeee
Reminds me of when Fiona started losing her hair in Coven
young/old = for a new supreme to rise, the old one must die
